title: Great Weapon Fighting
content:
Fighting Style does not work when throwing Versatile Thrown Weapons. Can do more damage if you are using a Greatsword. However, the damage increase is relatively minor. It's probably the best level 2 pickup if you're playing a fighter with a great weapon, but it's not bad to take the extra armor feat instead. Applies to extra damage added with equipment (that makes a damage roll) when making a melee attack.

Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Na
